content: a recipe for toe-up afterthought heel socks using a reinforced contrasting yarn for replaceable toes and heels there is also a photo tutorial 1 for the figure of eight cast on and afterthought heels on the loopknitlounge blog we updated the pattern 2 for spring 2018 1 http //www loopknitlounge com/2013/05/lots-of-socks/ 2 http //www loopknitlounge com/2018/05/spring-socks/
